official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Colbaltate(2-), [6-(amino-.kappa.N)-5-[[2-(hydroxy-.kappa.O)-4-nitrophenyl]a o-.kappa.N1]-N-methyl-2-naphthalenesulfonamidato(2-)][6-(ami o-.kappa.N)-5-[[2-(hydroxy-.kappa.O)-4-nitrophenyl]azo-.kapp .N1]-2-naphthalenesulfonato,(3-)]-, disodium.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2004, the duty on a specified chemical.

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Colbaltate(2-), [6-(amino-.kappa.N)-5-[[2-(hydroxy-.kappa.O)-4-nitrophenyl]a o-.kappa.N1]-N-methyl-2-naphthalenesulfonamidato(2-)][6-(ami o-.kappa.N)-5-[[2-(hydroxy-.kappa.O)-4-nitrophenyl]azo-.kapp .N1]-2-naphthalenesulfonato,(3-)]-, disodium.
